metadata.name: HOLY DAGGER
metadata.description:
Observing the reflection of the mind in its hands, The story of survival, connected to the images painted on the cave walls, all those abstract concepts, incarnated into a "Holy dagger", to become a heritage for the posterity.
"The Holy dagger"
a collaboration between TheGlamour and Hesam Jey
The first owner of this NFT will receive the 1/1 Physical swarovski Designed Dagger, signed and packaged.Â
